short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Easily and quickly add items to your Peeka orders.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extensions allows Peeka users to shop at Taobao, Dangdang and other major shopping portals in China and seamlessly add their new purchases to their Peeka orders.
